sense.name: a portion or percentage of a whole
sense.examples: John wants his fair share of the poker winnings. I've had my share of travel hassles this month! Our foreman doesn't think everyone has been doing his or her share of the work.

sense.name: capital stock in a corporation
sense.examples: I bought 2000 shares of Microsoft. How much is a share of Google worth these days?

sense.name: a tool for tilling soil
sense.examples: The steel share had trouble breaking a furrow in the heavy red clay. They turned swords into shares.
